short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assist with content generation and management of the crafty Store
short.uk: Аcистент що генерує контент і допомогає з сапортом в crafty Store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you want to save time and effort in communicating with your customers on Etsy? Look no further! Our new AI-Assist Chrome extension is designed to streamline your sales and support processes, giving you more time to focus on what you do best - creating and selling amazing products.
